info.injured: List of players who are injured on the selected day.
info.highPerformance: List of players with a "good" performance score — defined as greater than or equal to 40/100 — for the selected day.
info.topPerformance: List of the five players with the highest performance score of the day, based on those with available data for the selected day.
info.topInjured: List of the five players with the highest injury risk score of the day, based on those with available data for the selected day.

info.highPerformanceInfo: Percentage of players with a good performance — defined as a performance score of 40 or higher — relative to the total number of players with available data on the selected day.
info.teamPerformanceInfo: Average team performance score of the day, calculated based on the number of players with available data for the selected day.
info.playerListInfo: Players with available data on the selected day.
info.teamRiskInfo: Average injury risk of the team over the selected period (7 days, 1 month, 3 months, 6 months).
info.teamAvailabilityInfo: Team availability based on the number of players ready to play, defined as having an injury risk score lower than or equal to 10/100, relative to the total number of players with available data for the selected day.

info.teamRiskInfo: Average injury risk of the team over the selected period (7 days, 1 month, 3 months, 6 months).
info.teamAvailabilityInfo: Average number of players considered ready to play — defined as having an injury risk score lower than or equal to 10/100 — over the selected period (7 days, 1 month, 3 months, 6 months).
info.teamPerformanceInfo: Average team performance over the selected period (7 days, 1 month, 3 months, 6 months).
info.teamHighPerformanceInfo: Average number of players with a "good" performance — defined as a score greater than or equal to 40/100 — over the selected period (7 days, 1 month, 3 months, 6 months).
